desc: A one-year hands-on course covering Frontend Development with technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6, and React. Additionally, it includes Backend Development using NodeJS and database management with SQL.
A professional technical training program covering areas such as programming paradigms, databases, project management, and other key topics in the tech industry.

A hands-on course on front-end development using html, css, javascript, and React, including topics like responsive design, form validation, DOM manipulation, API integration, and best practices for React components, state management, and routing.

tipo: 40 hour online synchronous and asynchronous course
desc: A practical course on PostgreSQL, a popular open-source relational database management system, applied to web development. It covers topics such as creating tables, inserting and querying data, and optimizing database performance.
A mostly asynchronous diploma program covering user experience principles, user interface development using frontend technologies, and cybersecurity fundamentals.

nombre: Adopting the Agile Mindset: Agile Context
desc: An introductory course on agile methodologies for project management in the tech industry.
An asynchronous deep-dive course on CSS, including properties like Flexbox, CSS Grid, and Media Queries to develop responsive designs.
An introductory course on web development for static web pages, covering technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and version control with Git and GitHub.
A course covering hardware fundamentals, cleaning, maintenance, and replacement of components for desktop computers.
